nodes.text: A fleet was used by the Coduyo family of the Chiss Ascendancy. When the family was part of the Ruling Families, it had the right to possess a small fleet of warships, as all other families. After the Coduyo family was demoted to the Great Families centuries before the Nikardun conquests, they lost their right to the fleet, and only possessed several centuries-old cruisers located in their holdings at Massoss.
